attributes.action: Stop cutting our services or lower our council tax
attributes.background: Council tax goes up and all services are being cut Inc ambulance police fire bin collections and many more but our council tax just goes up

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Services in your local area are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
